text: Meltek Sato Kilman Livtuvanu (born 30 December 1957) is a Vanuatuan politician. He was the Prime Minister of Vanuatu, from 4 September 2023 to 6 October 2023. Kilman was previously Prime Minister from December 2010 to April 2011 and from May to June 2011, though his premiership was subsequently annulled by a court of law, and again from June 2015 to February 2016. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Vanuatu
title: Sato Kilman
